ygData.subject: Who needs sleep?
ygData.msgSnippet: I haven t played in days. Been tired, so I have actually opted to sleep rather than stay up late/get up early to play. I work twelve hour shifts, so getting an
ygData.messageBody:
I haven't played in days. Been tired, so I have actually opted to
sleep rather than stay up late/get up early to play. I work twelve
hour shifts, so getting an hour a day cuts into my sleep time. Most
of the time it is worth while, but this week I have needed the sleep.

The up side of my work schedule is that I get three or four days off
each week. If I don't work overtime, I get lots of hours to game. Not
a bad deal, most of the time.

Now if only I could play at work.

Hmmm.

Barto Proudfoot
